PUMI.func_preproc.info package¶

Submodules¶

PUMI.func_preproc.info.info_get module¶

PUMI.func_preproc.info.info_get.get_idx(in_files, refvolnumb=1, stop_idx=None, start_idx=None)¶

Adapted from C-PAC (https://github.com/FCP-INDI/C-PAC) Method to get the first and the last slice for the functional run. It verifies the user specified first and last slice. If the values are not valid, it calculates and returns the very first and the last slice

in_filestring (nifti file)

Path to input functional run

stop_idxint

Last volume to be considered, specified by user in the configuration file

stop_idxint

First volume to be considered, specified by user in the configuration file

stop_idxint

Value of first slice to consider for the functional run

start_idxint

Value of last slice to consider for the functional run

PUMI.func_preproc.info.info_get.get_scan_info(in_file)¶

Get useful scan-parameters.

Function to extract some useful scan-parameters.

in_filestr

Path to (functional!) nifti-image

TRfloat

Time-to-repetition of file
